Package com.aldodaquino.cobra.gui.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncPanel
    A JPanel that listen for ancestor changes.
    AuthorContentTable
    A JTable for the AuthorPanel.
    CatalogForm
    A JPanel used in the StarPanel.
    ChartWidget
    An InfoPanel used in the CustomerPanel.
    ComponentFactory
    Components factory: makes components creation faster and easier.
    ContentList
    a JList of Content objects.
    InfoPanel
    Info panel, superclass of AuthorInfoPanel, GenreInfoPanel and ChartWidget.
    LabelPanel
    Label JPanel, contains a fixed label and an updatable value.
    LoginForm
    Login Form under the Logo in the Starter Panel.
    Logo
    Application Logo for the StarterPanel.
    NewContentsWidget
    A widget inserted in the CustomerPanel under the ChartWidget.
    RoleForm
    The last of the Panels shows in the StarterPanel.
    StarPanel
    Shows rating or ask the user to vote.
    UpgradablePanel
    An AsyncPanel with GridBagLayout.
    UserInfo
    Shows the catalog to which the user is connected and the user address and premium status.
    ViewsContentTable
    A content list that includes also the number of views.
